verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he 's not mad] : " They 're a celebration of the human body as art . "
Trump said [ARG1: he] [V: 's] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: mad] : " They 're a celebration of the human body as art . "
Trump said he 's not mad : " [ARG1: They] [V: 're] [ARG2: a celebration of the human body as art] . "
